<br>

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="35%"}
&nbsp;
:::

::: {.column width="65%"}
- Take the best of SaaS and self-hosted worlds
- Not a generic managed service provider
- Direct input from product teams
- Expertise from Solutions Engineering and Product Development

> Avoid the outsourced IT model, want the clarity of shared responsibility model.

:::

# &nbsp;&nbsp; account architecture {background-image="_extensions/jthomasmock/positslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-light.png" background-size="contain"}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="35%"}
- Posit operators can only access workload accounts from a cloud-based secure operations center
- Posit does not have access to existing data plane accounts
- Both Posit and customer have access to workload account
- Workload account contains both acceptance and production environments

:::

::: {.column width="65%"}

```{r}
result <- system2(
    "../../.local/bin/d2", c("--layout=elk", "accounts.d2", "accounts.svg", "> /dev/null"),
    stdout = TRUE
)
result <- system2(
    "../../.local/bin/d2", c("--layout=elk", "workload.d2", "workload.png", "> /dev/null"),
    stdout = TRUE
)
knitr::include_graphics("accounts.svg")
```
:::

::::

# &nbsp;&nbsp; shared responsibility {background-image="_extensions/jthomasmock/positslides/assets/backgrounds/toc-light.png" background-size="contain"}

```{mermaid}
journey
    section Posit Dedicated Operators
      Configure & provision infra: 5: Operator
      Monitor & maintain: 5: Operator
      Respond to alerts: 3: Operator
      Plan and test upgrades: 5: Operator
    section Shared
      Audit account activity: 5: Operator, IT
      Review and approve upgrades: 3: IT, Data Admin
    section Data Scientist
      Select packages: 5: Data Admin
      Develop projects: 5: Data Scientist
      Running sessions and jobs: 5: Data Scientist
```
